entries.name: add_token_listener(obj)
entries.desc: Adds a token listener obj, but you should probably use #token_listener

entries.name: get_tk()
entries.desc: Fetches the next token from the scanner

entries.name: get_tk_until(*tokens)
entries.desc: Reads and returns all tokens up to one of tokens.  Leaves the matched token in the token list.

entries.name: get_tkread()
entries.desc: Retrieves a String representation of the read tokens

entries.name: peek_tk()
entries.desc: Peek at the next token, but don't remove it from the stream
